name: 艾丽莎·菲利普斯
name_full: 艾丽莎·菲利普斯 Elyssa Phillips
introduction: After studying at the British American Drama Academy in England, and graduating from The University of the Arts in Philadelphia, Elyssa spent her time performing around the country in various theatrical productions....from Shakespeare's "As You Like It" and "Measure For Measure", to the long-running improvisational comedies "Tony 'n Tina's Wedding" and "Shear Madness"...with some other tricks of her trade along the way....Since making the move out west to L.A., Elyssa has been seen in various commercials and television shows, including "Fresh Off The Boat", "Silicon Valley", and "The Mindy Project", among others. She is the former Artistic Director of The Pack Theater in Hollywood, and can still be seen performing in stand-up, sketch comedy, and improv shows whenever she can!Feel free to say hi to her. She doesn't bite. At least, we don't think she does.
